Package net.theblackchamber.crypto.exceptions

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MissingParameterExceptionTest  
    RuntimeCryptoExceptionTest  
    UnsupportedAlgorithmExceptionTest  
    UnsupportedKeySizeExceptionTest  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MissingParameterException
    Custom exception to be thrown when a parameter is expected to be passed to a method but null or blank is found instead.
    RuntimeCryptoException
    Custom runtime exception to be thrown when overriding methods will not allow us to specify custom checked exceptions.
    UnsupportedAlgorithmException
    Checked exception used to signal that the algorithm specified is not available or that the key attempting to be used with an algorithm doesnt support it.
    UnsupportedKeySizeException
    Custom checked exception to be thrown when a key provider is instantiated with a key of inappropriate size.
